feed.title: Combined summary - bitcoind and C++ namespaces?

entry.title: Combined summary - bitcoind and C++ namespaces?
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik, a Senior Software Engineer and open source evangelist at BitPay, is exploring the idea of wrapping most of the code inside a bitcoin namespace to slowly acclimate to C++ namespaces. He proposes that starting small and gaining experience is the way to go, with the option of bike shedding at any point.
